item.description: Track day at Loudon with the Fishtail school. I've done Penguin and Boston Moto before but have heard that Fishtail is closer to one on one instruction. (I know it's an odd day but everything else in august is sold out). You get assigned to a small group of riders and an instructor that stays with you and watches what you're doing. Riding streets just doesn't compare to being on the track where you can really learn your bike, its potential, and what it can do. I'm going with my brother Jay on his daytona 675.
item.name: 23Aug Fishtail track day at New Hampshire Motor Speedway!
